project_title: House Price Prediction Using Machine Learning
overview: This project builds a machine learning regression model to predict house prices based on features such as area, number of bedrooms, and location. It introduces the complete machine learning workflow including data loading, preprocessing, training, and evaluation.
prerequisites: No prior machine learning knowledge required
ide_setup: Install Python from python.org and add it to PATH
Install VS Code or Jupyter Notebook

roadmap.title: Load the Dataset
roadmap.description: Load the house price dataset using Pandas from a CSV file.

roadmap.title: Explore and Clean the Data
roadmap.description: Check for missing values, clean the data, and select relevant features.

roadmap.title: Split Data into Training and Testing Sets
roadmap.description: Separate features and target values, then split data into training and testing sets.

roadmap.title: Train the Machine Learning Model
roadmap.description: Train a regression model using the training dataset.

roadmap.title: Evaluate the Model
roadmap.description: Evaluate the model using test data and calculate error metrics.

deployment: Push the project code to a GitHub repository
Add a README explaining the project
Share the repository link on LinkedIn
extensions: Deploy the model as a web application
